content: **billow tote** ======================================= the billow tote is a stylish and practical crochet bag that you won t want to leave home without this easy pattern calls for a #5/bulky yarn so it works up super quickly using just basic stitches - the single_crochet and spiked single_crochet - this bag has a stylish and eye-catching texture the 100% cotton yarn combined with a smaller hook ensures this bag is strong and durable perfect for daily use **video** you can find a full video tutorial to accompany the written pattern here https //youtu be/9yq6pqcwrfm 1 **size** this pattern is written for one size width 15 75 / 40cm height 12 5 / 32cm **yarn requirements** any #5/bulky weight yarn ideally a cotton or cotton blend will work great for this pattern i used wecrochet billow 2 yarn which is 100% pima cotton approx yardage * c1 color 1 - ice lily 260 yds / 237m * tote 230 yds / 210m straps 30 yds / 27m * * c2 color 2 - natural 100 yds / 91m * total 360 yds / 328m **pattern support** as with all my patterns i am more than happy to offer any help and support that i can - please email me at sarah at nedandmimi dot com if you have any questions **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 3 to be kept in the loop about pattern releases freebies sales and much more © ned & mimi 2023 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale in fact i would be honoured if selling finished products from this pattern online i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi and link back to http //www nedandmimi com *due to the nature of the pdf files sales i cannot refund any patterns as it is not possible to return the purchase however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns * *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi © this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted * 1 https //youtu be/9yq6pqcwrfm 2 https //shrsl com/3hulh 3 https //nedandmimi com/subscribe
